thread.title: Battle of Culver Hill ceremony set for Friday | News | pressrepublican.com
thread.title_full: Battle of Culver Hill ceremony set for Friday | News | pressrepublican.com

author: LUCA GROSS Press-Republican
title: Battle of Culver Hill ceremony set for Friday | News | pressrepublican.com
text:
BEEKMANTOWN — A memorial ceremony will be held at Culver Hill Historic Park to honor those who fought in the Battle of Culver Hill during the War of 1812.
The ceremony will take place at 11 a.m on Friday, at Culver Hill Historic Park located at 6453 State Route 22 in Plattsburgh, about 2 miles north of the intersection with Route 374.
